newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: FORECAST - Portugal repo rate cut seen on Friday.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Portugal repo rate cut seen on Friday.

text.p: The Bank of Portugal could cut its repo rate on Friday by up to 0.25 percentage point after the Bundesbank surprised financial markets on Thursday with a larger-than-expected repo rate cut, analysts said.

"The Bank of Portugal already had room to cut its repo rate, and now it has even more room after the cut in the German rate," said Rui Martins dos Santos, chief economist of Banco Portugues de Investimento (BPI), one of seven analysts polled by Reuters.
"The Portuguese repo cut could be 25 basis points (bp)," he added.
